website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo IdeaCentre B540 all-in-one PC is one of the less expensive ways to get a true Windows 8 experience with a large screen. You do give up a little compared to more expensive all in ones, but it's still a decent buy all the same.
cons: No DX11 due to older Intel HD Graphics 2000

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using a laptop for years and now I have this fantastic PC I wonder how on earth we have managed so long without something like this. The set up is very easy and I find it intuitive to use. Love the fact it is a space saving device and that if we wanted could move it to another room and use it on wireless mode. I find it quiet to use and the sound is pretty good too. I'm very glad that we spent the money and purchased this -a great home PC.
customer_reviews.author: Miss R Bussy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the money.
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic all in one computer, found a litter difficult to get use to windows 8 put am getting there. If you need a good but not to expensive computer take a look at this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: This is really quiet, fast and esy to use. It boots up in 20 seconds and is really fast. Good value for money. And being an all in one, it is portable, so when my grandson came to visit, we were all able to talk to my sister's family in Australia by simply carrying the PC to the living room. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Iain

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC & EASY

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived so quick. Unfortunately had to return it as it wasn't a touch screen but Amazon was very helpful and supportive. I couldn't ask for any better service. Would strongly recommend this service.
customer_reviews.author: Lindo

customer_reviews.title: Great computer; defective keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The computer per se fulfill appears to fulfill all expectations. I am surprised, though, that Lenovo would chince on the keyboard and mouse; both cheap, plasticky and of all things, wired! It doesn't help that the keyboard appears to have crossed wires (literally) between the ' " ' and '@' keys. Disappointing, but then again, motivation to get a decent wireless keypad and mouse of the calibre one would expect with the overall package. This certainly diminishes my enthusiasm regarding this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: WINDOWS 8 - I HATE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this is quality hardware but loaded with Windows 8 I find it so unworkable that I do most of my work on an old laptop where I get things done in a reasonable time. I deeply regret this purchase.

product_meta.title: Lenovo C540 23-inch All-in-One PC - Black (Intel Core i5 3330S 3.0GHz Processor, 6GB RAM, 2TB HDD, DVDRW, LAN, WLAN, Webcam, Integrated Graphics, Windows 8)
product_meta.description:
The Lenovo C540 features a space-saving slim design that will look good in any room. Click here to see a larger image. LENOVO C540 ALL-IN-ONE DESKTOP PC
A PERFECT BALANCE OF PERFORMANCE AND AFFORDABILITY
The Lenovo C540 is one of the most affordable 23" All-in-One PCs available. With a 3rd generation Intel Core i3 or Pentium processor, this PC's performance is better than most in its price range. Great for email, video playback, the C540 also comes with Lenovo Assistant - an easy to use interface to organise your favourites, clean up history and junk files, and manage the PC's network connections and energy consumption. Plus, smart features like Lenovo Dynamic Brightness System and Lenovo Eye Distance System ensure that the C540 is comfortable to use, even for long periods.

COMFORTABLE
23" FULL HD SCREEN WITH BUILT-IN ENTERTAINMENT
Featuring a 23" LED-backlit Full HD widescreen display and cinematic 16:9 aspect ratio, the C540 is great for enjoying movies and videos without eye strain. Having trouble locating the DVD reader/writer drive in such a slim design? It's built right into the side of the PC - giving you easy access to watch your favourite movies as well as back up your files.

ADJUSTABLE SCREEN ANGLE
You don't always use a PC on your own at a desk, so the C540 comes with an adjustable screen angle to ensure viewing is comfortable whatever the lighting conditions, even if you're sharing the screen with other family members.

You can customise the Lenovo C540 to adjust the display brightness to protect your eyes, and warn you if you're too close to the screen. Click here to see a larger image. LENOVO DYNAMIC BRIGHTNESS SYSTEM
The Lenovo Dynamic Brightness System protects your eyes by automatically adjusting screen brightness based on ambient light conditions. This system is user customisable, it can be set up to automatically power off the display to save energy when the user is away and it is auto run at startup.

LENOVO EYE DISTANCE SYSTEM
The Lenovo Eye Distance System alerts you if you are too close to the screen. Fully customisable, simply select the distance you want the system to alert you at and a pop-up box will appear when the C540 determines you have moved too close.

SUPER SLIM FOR SMALL SPACES
The C540 desktop's all-in-one design makes it perfect for small spaces: university room, busy kitchen, bedroom, studio or other cramped quarters. The compact C540 combines the traditional tower desktop, screen with built-in camera, speakers and microphone into one slim unit. Also, fewer components and cables equal a tidier and more compact workspace.

The minimalist dimensions of the C540 allow for setup and use anywhere, while the intelligently-designed aluminium stand is sturdy but takes up little space. The stand design also provides space to slide the keyboard and mouse under the display, allowing you to keep your desk or work-surface uncluttered when not in use.

The Lenovo Assistant is an easy-to-use interface that's designed to keep your PC clean, organised, and running efficiently. Click here to see a larger image. HD 720P WEBCAM
Take your web chats to the next level thanks to the built-in HD webcam. Your friends and family will be able to see you in clear 720p resolution, which means the picture will look fantastic, even on a large TV screen. The HD webcam will capture and stream video with greater detail and truer colours than standard webcams, perfect for recording videos to upload to social media site, or for talking with loved ones.

SIMPLIFIED
LENOVO ASSISTANT
On the C540, you'll find Lenovo Assistant ready to help -- an easy-to-use interface to organise your favourites, clean up history and junk files and manage the PC's network connections and energy consumption

The Lenovo Assistant is designed to make it easy for you to keep on top of a number of computer tasks, including helping to resolve internet connection problems and select the best power usage setting. It will also help clean your browsing history and passwords, tidy files on your desktop, clean junk files and manage web browser favourites.

ONEKEY RESCUE SYSTEM
You can rest at ease knowing OneKey Rescue System is there to simplify data backup and recovery, allowing you to focus on using your computer instead of worrying about its maintenance. With the touch of a button, users can restore the system and recover valuable data - the OneKey Rescue System also recovers essential system files in the event of corruption and can be used to initiate a virus scan before entering Windows. 

Back-up and recover valuable data easily with the OneKey Rescue System. Click here to see a larger image. YOUCAM
YouCam is a suite of advanced webcam software for facial tracking and image effects. By allowing you to take control of your recording and customise the video, YouCam makes the whole webcam experience more interactive.

CHILDREN'S EDUCATIONAL SOFTWARE AND APPS
The Lenovo C540 is a family friendly computer, and because of this you'll find this PC comes with a range of educational software and apps designed to keep kids entertained for hours. Whether on their own or with a parent, your children will enjoy the brightly coloured games and puzzles.

RESPONSIVE
SMART INTEL PROCESSORS
Get the power you need and great visuals with 3rd generation Intel Core and Pentium processors. Enjoy a richer, seamless, visual experience for gaming, movies, photos and more without hesitations or interruptions, or work on multiple tasks at the same time without waiting for your computer to catch up.

FAST MEMORY AND SPACIOUS STORAGE
Whichever Lenovo C540 you choose, inside you'll find fast DDR3 RAM to help your PC handle the most demanding multitasking. You'll also find a large hard drive perfect for storing your files and favourite multimedia.

The C540 comes with educational software and apps to help your children learn while having fun. NETWORKING AND CONNECTIVITY
With its integrated 802.11n Wi-Fi networking capabilities, this PC provides up to five times the performance and twice the wireless range using 802.11n-compatible routers as you would with 802.11g networks. It's also backward compatible with 802.11b/g networks (commonly found at Wi-Fi hotspots and in older home routers). The C540 also provides ultra-fast Gigabit Ethernet networking (10/100/1000).

 You'll also find that this PC includes multiple USB 2.0 for easy connections to your favourite peripherals and mobile devices and a 6-in-1 card reader to allow you to transfer files quickly from your camera or phone to your PC.

DOLBY ADVANCED AUDIO 2.0
The Lenovo C540 features integrated stereo speakers that are custom tuned by Dolby to maximise volume and to eliminate distortion. Dolby Advanced Audio will conveniently maintain the volume level across applications - meaning no more loud surprises when switching applications. Experience less audio distortion at higher volumes with the built-in speakers and enjoy a cinematic surround sound experience.

Enhance your Windows 8 experience with the optimised software and hardware features of Lenovo EE8. Click here to see a larger image. WINDOWS 8 WITH LENOVO ENHANCED EXPERIENCE 8
Microsoft's sleekest, most innovative operating system yet. Built around touch technology and tiled applications, the OS takes the PC experience to a new level of customisation, consumption and creation.

Created specifically for the new Windows 8 OS, Lenovo has combined the best hardware and software features to create Lenovo Enhanced Experience 8.

CONNECT
Lenovo Cloud - Imagine your files, everywhere. Lenovo's online storage and cloud utilities allow you the freedom to choose your device and location. With 5 GB of free storage, you'll be able to secure and access your files wherever you are, on whatever machine you find yourself on.

DISCOVER
Exclusive Lenovo Content - Discover all the amazing things you can do with exclusive tools from Lenovo. Learn how to get the most from your PC with Lenovo Companion or monitor your system performance with Lenovo Support. Lenovo keeps you up to date and delivers music, game and video content you can't get from anyone else.

A World of Apps - Discover and download thousands of apps. Choose from Microsoft's Windows 8 store or Lenovo's curated collection of optimised apps.
